Name: Block_Quotes
Lefferts Garden: ['[Welcome to] the trendy hood called Brooklyn Lefferts Garden...a multi-ethnic, friendly, safe neighborhood.', 'The train ride to Manhattan is only 15 minutes! The train takes you directly to Times Square, Union Square, the Empire State Building, Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, The Village, Harlem, Chinatown, the Upper West Side and Central Park. You can also take a short subway ride to the beach (Brighton Beach, Coney Island).']

Name: Lede
Lefferts Garden: An ethnically diverse neighborhood bordering Brooklyns Prospect Park,  Lefferts Garden mixes easy accessibility with down-to-earth amiability. Serving up some of NYCs finest Caribbean cuisine on the ground floors of its brownstones and townhouses, this neighborhood is appreciated for its quiet streets and commuter-friendly location.

Name: Intro
Lefferts Garden: Caribbean flavors and quaint townhouses typify this easily accessible Brooklyn neighborhood.

Name: Photo_Captions
Lefferts Garden: ["Lefferts Garden comprises an easy-going community along Brooklyn's beloved park, Prospect Park.", 'Mostly residential and mainly low-key, this Brooklyn neighborhood maintains an even keel.', "It's easy to reach Manhattan from Lefferts Garden. The neighborhood has its own subway station.", 'Lefferts Garden stands out for its culinary culture - Caribbean markets and restaurants populate the neighborhood.']
